column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have chronic neck and back pain from scoliosis and two car accidents and I had C4-7 fused.  Since I am very sensitive to all oral meds, especially anti-inflammatories, I tried the Flector patches.  I used them for years until recently I ended up in the ER with severe abdominal pain from an ulcer caused by these patches. Be careful.

column2: 45-54 Female  (Patient)
column9: I used samples given by my Dr. & found great relief for my lower back pain. Oral meds I tried worked but gave me dry mouth & made me lightheaded.

column2: dancinheart, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Wearing half patch on foot to treat PT tendon disfunction.  Works very well as anti-inflammatory but it is making me nauseas today. New and unexpected side effect

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I was in a car accident, and for a month I had severe pain in my hip.  My Doctor put one of these patches on me in her office.  With in 15 minutes the pain was gone, and now, 12 hours later is still gone.  I now have a prescription and will continue the use.  I suffered so so long, and now have no pain.

column2: moose1, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Lower back pain relieved for up to 8 hours.

column2: Peaches, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I have tried a lot of prescription and OTC medication for the arthritis in my back. I am a nurse and walk and bend alot. This patch has helped me make it through my 12 hour shifts. I am also able to turn over in the bed after using the patch. This is the only prescription that I went back to the doctor for a repeat. I have very little patience for things that don't work quickly. I have been able to stop the patch and go back to just Aleve. But believe me, I have a few on hand for when the back has been over worked.

column2: odahel, 45-54 Female  (Patient)
column9: The patches move alot, they do seem to take the edge off the pain but I seem to be fixing the patch all the time

column2: who dat, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: after having the patch on all night for the first time, i woke up with stomach pain and lethergy ,weakness.i found the information here and decided i would rather go back to me old med.  i don't like the risks associated with treatment for myself.  i remove the patch after reading the warnings.

column2: LadeeHawke, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I too have had great success with this medication.  I am using it for torn cartilage in my knee.  It was extremely painful and actually had me in tears and could barely walk when at it's worst.  The patch has reduced the pain to a managable level.  I am very impressed with the effectiveness of this patch.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: Day one and the improvement is remarkable already!

column2: 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Have Titanium brace C2 to C7 and spinylosis of the lower back and chronic kidney failure due to NSAID's, The patch does not effect my one kidney.Humana's Madicare part D does not cover this patch.

column2: Kneeprob, 25-34 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I had knee surgery four years ago. When my knee hurts this was a great solution because it sticks well to the area and stays on.  I found it does not work right away, but slowly takes the pain away for 12-24 hours. Nsaids can cause buzzing in the ears.

column2: momiller66, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: My doctor gave me a free sample of this patch yesterday. I am using it for pain in my hip (Trochanteric bursitis). It has cut the pain by at least 60-70%. I was once addicted to oxycontin and vicodin so I had to try other means of pain relief.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have had over 10 car accidents, a major ski accident hitting a tree, and broken most of the bones in my body.  I am applying these patches on my neck and lower back as needed in addition to receiving depomedrol shots in my C7 and Sacrilliac to relieve chronic pain.  I am not on any narcotics and just began this new pain management process.  These patches are amazing and relieve the pain so well.  I am very pleased.

column2: 13-18 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My son is a competetive swimmer who had "whiplashed" his neck. This was very effective at relieving both the pain and swelling. Also, he is a senior in high school so he didn't have to take pills during school hours!

column2: Jill, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have a pinched nerve in my elbow and tried accupuncture, physical therapy, and a cortazone shot. They each worked for a very short time. When I used the patch I was amazed at how quickly it worked (after just one use). I have full range of motion with my elbow, no pain, and have even resumed working out. It has made me extremely tired though, which I just read was a side affect.

column2: Itakejake, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I have heel spurs and achillies tendonitis and this medicine works for me . I have severe pain when I walk but with these patches, it is almost gone. I am amazed at how well these patches work.

column2: wis3912@aol.com, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I could not believe how fast it works . I have severe inflamation of my shoulder causing me to not to be able to hold my head up and the patch was put on in the doctors office and within 15 mins. I walked out with the pain gone and able to put my neck back and hold my head up . and the swelling went down that was causing a hump. and i could sleep out of pain and I have taken pain medicine to try to stop the pain and it did not work. and I have sleeped on a heating pad and it did not work. the patchis wonderful. I even had my hip hurting that I had to hold it to walk and it made me limp I put a patch on it and in 5 mins. I could walk without pain and by the next day the pains was totally gone and has not returned. I was very skeptical of the patch when my doctor wanted me to try them . but I am very impressed by them . and I have so much more movement and less pain.

column2: jaydog, 45-54 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have 6 herniated discs from my lumbar up to my neck. multi levels in my thoracic my neck has been fused I am on a lot of strong narcotics but these patches do work I am very impressed I cannot take anti-inflamitories they make my stomach bleed so when my doc suggested I try these I had high hopes and was not disapointed I just hope that they continue to be as effective after being on them for a while
